    • Constructor Detail

      • PincodeTerminalTestDriver

        public PincodeTerminalTestDriver(java.lang.String title,
                                 int xPos,
                                 int yPos)
        Creates a graphically simulated pincode terminal. Can only be instantiated inside an JavaFX Application Thread.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the window.
        xPos - The horizontal location of the window on the screen.
        yPos - The vertical location of the window on the screen.
